= Bazooka RPG =

== Summary ==

Bazooka is a virtual tabletop (VTT) application for playing Dungeons and Dragons (DND) Fifth Edition (5e).

== Features ==

* Character management
* Combat management
* Maps and images
  - Tile-based map editor
  - Stretch goal - dynamic line of sight?
* Spells and effects
* Campaign/story editing - with lots of links to jump to necessary information
* (WANT) 3D dice rolling with smooth, realistic physics

== Technical Aspects ==

* Need in-browser window management
